name: 1 Bit Racer
description:
Simple 1-bit racing game. Made in a few hours for the Jammin Game Jam. Sadly, no time for sound.

Controls:

  • Up Arrow - Accelerate
  • Left/Right Arrow - Steer

Gameplay:

  • Collect the Boosts to speed up. (1 - Fast, 2 - Faster, 3 - Fastest)
  • Try to get the fastest time!
  • Stay on the road!
  • Go fullscreen for best experience.
